cai.name: Climate action incentive (CAI)
cai.description: everyone gets this payment. You get 10% extra if you live outside a Census Metropolitan Area.

dtc.name: Disability tax credit (DTC)
dtc.description: an amount based on your situation. You may be able to get DTC if you have applied and CRA approves your application.

gsthstc.name: Goods and services tax/harmonized sales tax (GST/HST) credit
gsthstc.description: per year, up to $451 for one person, $592 if you have a spouse or common-law partner, and $155 for each child under age 19.

otb.name: Ontario trillium benefit (OTB)
otb.description: a payment that helps with energy, sales and property tax. The government usually pays this amount on the 10th day of each month for 12 months.
